availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William B. Hatton (Clay County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Nancy Lucas Hatton in Clay County, Kentucky, on June 18, 1841. Father of Elizabeth Hatton, John Hatton, Mary Hatton, Lucinda Hatton, Olzy Hatton, Harvey Hatton, Lewis Hatton, and Mariah Hatton. Farmer in Clay County in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Kentucky District, p. 123B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 150-151.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 1, p. 142A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film 007728055.
